Subbed Projects.Show Name: One Piece Movie 9: Episode of Chopper Plus - Fuyu ni Saku, Kiseki no Sakura

Good Comments: Many translation errors. "toukakan" 3 weeks? "hannichi" an hour?

Too many translation errors to mention, (For starters, "Noko Noko" is a pun on the word "Mushroom". Chopper even POINTS THIS OUT! How could they miss it?!) incorrect aspect ratio and unreadable song translations.
The 10 people who approve of this release obviously does not care about TL errors, resolution errors and other errors.
Bad Comments: Too many translator notes.  I don't care that Chopper called Luffy "Mugiwara Boushi" when everyone calls him "Mugiwara", even though the translation is essentially the exact same thing..
can't think of a single positive thing about it, honestly
